dc_title_s: Essexiae descriptio: The description of Essex; Amstelodami, sumptibus Ioannis Ianssonii.
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. Title cartouche in lower right corner is surrounded by an angel with a lyre, a cherub, and Pan with his pipes. There are ships in the ocean. This state was published in atlases by Jan Jansson in 1636 and 1637. From the Jansson Appendix Atlas 1636-1680, title created to represent a unique collection within the Clark Library, University of Michigan. 1 map; 37 x 47 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664.,Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664. Appendix Atlas.,Vignaud, Henry, 1830-1922, former owner.
